query.name: osg_hours_efficiency_tree_map_by_vo_project_facility

sql.filler: UPPER(VO.VOName), UPPER(PNC.ReportableProjectName), (CASE R.ResourceType WHEN 'BatchPilot' THEN R.HostDescription WHEN 'Batch' THEN S.SiteName ELSE '' END), R.CommonName
AND R.WallDuration > 0 AND PNC.ReportableProjectName regexp :projectname AND (NOT (PNC.ReportableProjectName regexp :exclude-projectname))
